Chess Connect - Triathlon

9th March 2025 | 10:00 AM - 3:30 PM

Event Details

Join us for Chess Connect - Triathlon, a one-of-a-kind chess challenge that tests your versatility across three exciting formats! Compete in 9 Swiss rounds, starting with Blitz (5+3), followed by Freestyle Chess (Chess960, 5+3), and concluding with Rapid (10+5) after a lunch break.

Whether you’re a speed chess enthusiast, a fan of creative openings, or a strategic mastermind, this event is perfect for you! Connect with fellow chess lovers, test your adaptability, and enjoy a thrilling chess marathon.

What’s Included:

  • 9 rounds of chess in three formats:
    • Blitz (5+3) – 3 rounds
    • Freestyle Chess (5+3) – 3 rounds
    • Rapid (10+5) – 3 rounds
  • Special prizes for the Top 3 players
  • Chance to win Premium Chess Sets from Paramount Chess through a Lucky Draw
  • Chance to win a Chess.com Diamond Membership through a Lucky Draw

Schedule

  • Registration & Player Briefing – 10:00 AM

  • Blitz (5+3) Rounds:

    • Round 1 – 10:20 AM
    • Round 2 – 10:45 AM
    • Round 3 – 11:10 AM

  • Freestyle Chess (5+3) Rounds:

    • Round 4 – 11:40 AM
    • Round 5 – 12:05 PM
    • Round 6 – 12:30 PM

  • Lunch Break – 12:50 PM

  • Rapid (10+5) Rounds:

    • Round 7 – 1:30 PM
    • Round 8 – 2:10 PM
    • Round 9 – 3:00 PM

Game Variations:

  • Chess Triathlon (Swiss Format): Test your versatility across three exciting chess formats in this unique Swiss Format tournament! Compete in 9 rounds, starting with fast-paced Blitz, followed by the creative challenge of Freestyle Chess (Chess960), and wrapping up with strategic Rapid games. With a mix of speed, adaptability, and deep calculation, this event is the ultimate test of all-around chess skills. Whether you're a seasoned player or up for a fun challenge, embrace the thrill of switching formats and make every move count!

Looking to Upgrade your Chess Gear?

Enhance your chess experience with premium chess sets from Paramount Chess. Explore a variety of designs and styles to find the perfect fit for your game.

  • Visit: paramountchess.com
  • Email: paramountchess100@gmail.com
  • Call: 7043772271

Terms & Conditions

By participating in this event, you agree to the following terms:

  • Tickets: All tickets are non-refundable. Late arrivals may miss rounds, so please arrive at least 15 minutes early for check-in.
  • Venue Rules: Participants must follow venue policies on decorum and safety. The organizer is not responsible for lost or misplaced belongings.
  • Photography & Media: By attending, you consent to photos and videos taken during the event being used for promotional purposes by the organizer.

Contact Us: bangalorechessclubofficial@gmail.com | @bangalorechessclub

Event Location

The Market Place
Ground floor, RMZ Infinity, Bennigana Halli, Bengaluru, India

Address

Bangalore, India bangalorechessclubofficial@gmail.com

Info

Bangalore Chess Club is the largest offline Chess Community in India where we aim to promote chess as a non competitive sport across ages and skill levels. Always striving to make chess fun.
